record.dc:title: 8MCL6, 15MCL6, McLean County, Kentucky. Eaton Site. Crew beginning section.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Taken of crew beginning the 70' - 65' section and indicating method of taking down small forward sections in six-inch levels. In the background to the north is seen the L&N railroad tracks, while in the left background the house of Island. From Notes: Weather -- clear and sunny. Adjustments -- f 32; 1/2 sec. Subject -- General view of crew in operation cutting into 70' profile. Demonstrates vertical and horizontal technique of procedure. Camera position -- in Sq. 85-R-7.
